feedback.fit: The loose, oversized sweater pairs well with the fitted high-waisted shorts, creating a balanced silhouette.
feedback.color: The soft pink and black color scheme is feminine and chic, but could benefit from an additional pop of color.
feedback.footwear: The wedge sandals elongate the legs and dress up the casual outfit.
feedback.accessories: Adding a few simple accessories like a delicate necklace or bracelet could elevate the look further.
feedback.style: Overall, this outfit achieves a stylish casual chic vibe that is perfect for a variety of occasions.

labels.fit: Fitted on top, loose on bottom

feedback.fit: The loose blouse tucked into the high-waisted shorts creates a flattering hourglass shape.
feedback.color: The crisp white and bold red make a striking, eye-catching combination.
feedback.footwear: The leopard print booties add a fun, trendy element and pair surprisingly well with the red shorts.
feedback.accessories: While the outfit looks great as is, a long pendant necklace could be a nice addition.
feedback.style: This outfit perfectly embodies casual chic style - polished and put-together, yet still relaxed and comfortable.

feedback.fit: The oversized sweater and long scarf create cozy, comfortable layers that are perfect for chilly weather.
feedback.color: The rust orange, gray, and black color scheme is autumnal and stylish.
feedback.footwear: The black ankle boots ground the look and add a slight edge.
feedback.accessories: The printed scarf and sunglasses are the perfect finishing touches that tie the look together.
feedback.style: This outfit nails cozy casual style - it looks effortless and cool while still being warm and snuggly.

labels.fit: Loose on top, fitted on bottom

feedback.fit: The loose sweater and skinny jeans create a nice balance of proportions.
feedback.color: The mint green, gray, and white make a fresh, pretty color palette, though the red boots add an unexpected pop.
feedback.footwear: The red ankle boots are a bold choice that really makes the outfit stand out.
feedback.accessories: The printed bag adds another fun element to the look.
feedback.style: This outfit mixes casual and chic elements for a stylish everyday look with a bit of quirky personality.

feedback.fit: The loose, ruffled blouse contrasts nicely with the fitted pencil skirt for a feminine silhouette.
feedback.color: The yellow and white color scheme is cheerful and summery, but could use more contrast.
feedback.footwear: The nude pumps elongate the legs and complement the outfit without competing with it.
feedback.accessories: The printed bag adds a cute vintage touch.
feedback.style: This outfit has a sweet, vintage-inspired feel that would be perfect for a daytime event or brunch date.

feedback.fit: The loose cardigan and flowy maxi skirt create an effortless, bohemian silhouette.
feedback.color: The mint green, white, and brown color scheme is soft and natural.
feedback.footwear: The brown wedge sandals complement the outfit nicely and add a bit of height.
feedback.accessories: Some delicate layered necklaces or bangles could enhance the free-spirited vibe.
feedback.style: This outfit embodies a relaxed, bohemian casual style that's perfect for weekends or vacation.

feedback.fit: The loose, boxy fit of the shirt and shorts is relaxed but a bit shapeless.
feedback.color: The white and neon green color combo is very bold and striking, but could be hard to pull off.
feedback.footwear: The brown lace-up wedges add nice contrast and visual interest.
feedback.accessories: A brown belt could help define the waist and pull the look together.
feedback.style: This outfit has a preppy casual vibe, but the bold colors make it more fashion-forward and daring.

feedback.fit: The fitted lace blouse and high-waisted skirt create a beautiful, feminine silhouette that highlights the waist.
feedback.color: The dusty rose and black color scheme is romantic and sophisticated.
feedback.footwear: The black lace-up heels add a slightly edgy touch that contrasts nicely with the sweet lace blouse.
feedback.accessories: Some vintage-inspired jewelry, like drop earrings or a pendant necklace, could elevate the look even more.
feedback.style: This outfit perfectly embodies a romantic, vintage-inspired style that feels classic and timeless.

feedback.fit: The loose printed cardigan over the dress creates an interesting layered look.
feedback.color: The teal, gray and white color scheme is cool and understated, allowing the prints to take center stage.
feedback.footwear: The brown oxford shoes are an unexpected choice that adds to the quirky, academic vibe.
feedback.accessories: The bow headband and satchel-style bag are the perfect quirky finishing touches.
feedback.style: This outfit has a delightfully quirky, vintage-inspired style that showcases the wearer's unique personality.

feedback.fit: The fitted blazer and skirt create a polished, feminine silhouette.
feedback.color: The yellow, blue and white color scheme is cheerful and eye-catching, perfect for spring or summer.
feedback.footwear: The nude peep-toe heels elongate the legs and complement the outfit beautifully.
feedback.accessories: The flower hair accessory and printed clutch add the perfect playful, retro-inspired touches.
feedback.style: This outfit has a fun, flirty retro vibe that feels fresh and modern at the same time - perfect for a special occasion.
